<h3 align="left" id="sites-page-title-header" style="font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding-top: 3px; padding-right: 10px; padding-bottom: 3px; padding-left: 10px; " xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">

						<div dir="ltr">
							從3.0版開始，JComicDownloader提供設置背景圖片的功能，搭配適當字體顏色，達到介面<b>客製化</b>的需求。
							<div>

							<div>

							</div>

							<div>
								<b>範例二：</b></div>
							<div>
								<div style="display: block; text-align: left; ">
									<a href="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_example2.jpg?attredirects=0" imageanchor="1" style="color: rgb(0, 102, 204); outline-style: none; outline-width: initial; outline-color: initial; background-image: none; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: initial; border-bottom-style: none; border-bottom-width: initial; border-bottom-color: initial; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; "><img border="0" src="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/_/rsrc/1327212072919/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_example2.jpg" style="border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; " /></a></div>
							</div>

							<div>
								<b>範例三：</b></div>
							<div>
								<div style="display: block; text-align: left; ">
									<a href="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_example3.jpg?attredirects=0" imageanchor="1" style="color: rgb(0, 102, 204); outline-style: none; outline-width: initial; outline-color: initial; background-image: none; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: initial; border-bottom-style: none; border-bottom-width: initial; border-bottom-color: initial; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; "><img border="0" src="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/_/rsrc/1327211713879/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_example3.jpg" style="border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; " /></a></div>
							</div>

							<div>
								<b>範例四：</b></div>
							<div>
								<div style="display: block; text-align: left; ">
									<b><a href="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_example4.jpeg?attredirects=0" imageanchor="1" style="color: rgb(0, 102, 204); outline-style: none; outline-width: initial; outline-color: initial; background-image: none; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: initial; border-bottom-style: none; border-bottom-width: initial; border-bottom-color: initial; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; "><img border="0" src="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/_/rsrc/1327307012048/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_example4.jpeg" style="border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; " /></a></b></div>
							</div>
							<div>
								&nbsp;</div>
							<div>
								&nbsp;</div>
							<div>
								<b><span style="font-weight: normal; "><b>範例四：</b></span></b></div>
							<div>
								<div style="display: block; text-align: left; ">
									<b><span style="font-weight: normal; "><b><a href="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_example5.jpeg?attredirects=0" imageanchor="1" style="color: rgb(0, 102, 204); outline-style: none; outline-width: initial; outline-color: initial; background-image: none; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: initial; border-bottom-style: none; border-bottom-width: initial; border-bottom-color: initial; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; "><img border="0" src="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/_/rsrc/1327307079279/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_example5.jpeg" style="border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; " /></a></b></span></b></div>
							</div>
							<div>
								&nbsp;</div>
							<div>
								&nbsp;</div>
							<hr />
							<div>
								<br />
								<div>
									<br />
									<div>
										&nbsp;</div>
									<div>
										<b><font color="#ffffff" style="background-color: rgb(106, 168, 79); ">設置步驟如下：</font></b></div>
									<div>
										&nbsp;</div>
									<div>
										1. 開啟JComicDownloader -&gt;&nbsp;<b>選項</b>&nbsp;-&gt;&nbsp;<b>佈景</b>，請先按右邊的<b><font color="#990000">設定頁面</font></b>按鈕設定選擇背景圖片：</div>
									<div>
										<div style="display: block; text-align: left; ">
											<a href="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_01.png?attredirects=0" imageanchor="1" style="color: rgb(0, 102, 204); outline-style: none; outline-width: initial; outline-color: initial; background-image: none; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: initial; border-bottom-style: none; border-bottom-width: initial; border-bottom-color: initial; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; "><img border="0" src="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/_/rsrc/1327210662504/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_01.png" style="border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; " /></a></div>
									</div>
									<div>
										&nbsp;</div>
									<div>
										2. 進入到設定頁面，首先按下<font color="#990000"><b>選擇新的背景圖片</b></font>按鈕：</div>
									<div>
										<div style="display: block; text-align: left; ">
											<a href="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_02.png?attredirects=0" imageanchor="1" style="color: rgb(0, 102, 204); outline-style: none; outline-width: initial; outline-color: initial; background-image: none; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: initial; border-bottom-style: none; border-bottom-width: initial; border-bottom-color: initial; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; "><img border="0" src="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/_/rsrc/1327210698845/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_02.png" style="border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; " /></a></div>
									</div>
									<div>
										&nbsp;</div>
									<div>
										3. 從系統目錄中挑選喜好的圖片，而後按下<b>確定</b>：</div>
									<div>
										<div style="display: block; text-align: left; ">
											<a href="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_03.png?attredirects=0" imageanchor="1" style="color: rgb(0, 102, 204); outline-style: none; outline-width: initial; outline-color: initial; background-image: none; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: initial; border-bottom-style: none; border-bottom-width: initial; border-bottom-color: initial; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; "><img border="0" src="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/_/rsrc/1327210740983/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_03.png" style="border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; " /></a></div>
										<div style="display: block; text-align: left; ">
											&nbsp;</div>
										<div style="display: block; text-align: left; ">
											&nbsp;</div>
										<div style="display: block; text-align: left; ">
											4.背景圖片挑選完畢後，可再對字體顏色進行細部設定，直接點擊按鈕即可：</div>
										<div style="display: block; text-align: left; ">
											<div style="display: block; text-align: left; ">
												<a href="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_11.png?attredirects=0" imageanchor="1" style="color: rgb(0, 102, 204); outline-style: none; outline-width: initial; outline-color: initial; background-image: none; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: initial; border-bottom-style: none; border-bottom-width: initial; border-bottom-color: initial; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; "><img border="0" src="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/_/rsrc/1327210903806/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_11.png" style="border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; " /></a></div>
										</div>
										<div style="text-align: left; ">
											&nbsp;</div>
									</div>
									<div>
										&nbsp;</div>
									<div>
										5. 點擊挑選顏色按鈕後會跳出選項視窗，從裡面挑選好適合的顏色，再按下<b>確定</b>：</div>
									<div>
										<div style="display: block; text-align: left; ">
											<a href="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_12.png?attredirects=0" imageanchor="1" style="color: rgb(0, 102, 204); outline-style: none; outline-width: initial; outline-color: initial; background-image: none; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: initial; border-bottom-style: none; border-bottom-width: initial; border-bottom-color: initial; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; "><img border="0" src="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/_/rsrc/1327210921410/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_12.png" style="border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; " /></a></div>
									</div>
									<div>
										&nbsp;</div>
									<div>
										&nbsp;</div>
									<div>
										6. 背景圖片和字體顏色都設置完畢後，便可按<b>確定</b>離開：</div>
									<div>
										<div style="display: block; text-align: left; ">
											<a href="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_04.png?attredirects=0" imageanchor="1" style="color: rgb(0, 102, 204); outline-style: none; outline-width: initial; outline-color: initial; background-image: none; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: initial; border-bottom-style: none; border-bottom-width: initial; border-bottom-color: initial; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; "><img border="0" src="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/_/rsrc/1327210756455/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_04.png" style="border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; " /></a></div>
									</div>
									<div>
										&nbsp;</div>
									<div>
										7.&nbsp;現提醒訊息，告知需要重新執行程式才能展現設定成果：</div>
									<div>
										<img border="0" src="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/_/rsrc/1327210770163/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_05.png" /></div>
									<div>
										&nbsp;</div>
									<div>
										&nbsp;</div>
									<div>
										8. 回到選項視窗，此時可以<b>勾選</b>欲設置背景圖片的視窗，勾選完畢後按下<b>確定</b>：</div>
									<div>
										（以上只示範了主視窗的設置，請依需要自行設置其他視窗）</div>
									<div>
										<img border="0" src="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/_/rsrc/1327210785569/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_06.png" /></div>
									<div>
										&nbsp;</div>
									<div>
										&nbsp;</div>
									<div>
										9. 跳出提醒訊息，告知由於主視窗的背景圖片設定有更動，需要重新執行程式才能展示設定成果：</div>
									<div>
										<div style="display: block; text-align: left; ">
											<a href="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_07.png?attredirects=0" imageanchor="1" style="color: rgb(0, 102, 204); outline-style: none; outline-width: initial; outline-color: initial; background-image: none; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: initial; border-bottom-style: none; border-bottom-width: initial; border-bottom-color: initial; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; "><img border="0" src="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/_/rsrc/1327210799594/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_07.png" style="border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; " /></a></div>
									</div>
									<div>
										&nbsp;</div>
									<div>
										10. 因此我們依訊息要求，先關閉程式再開啟：</div>
									<div>
										<div style="display: block; text-align: left; ">
											<a href="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_08.png?attredirects=0" imageanchor="1" style="color: rgb(0, 102, 204); outline-style: none; outline-width: initial; outline-color: initial; background-image: none; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: initial; border-bottom-style: none; border-bottom-width: initial; border-bottom-color: initial; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; "><img border="0" src="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/_/rsrc/1327210814745/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_08.png" style="border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; " /></a></div>
									</div>
									<div>
										&nbsp;</div>
									<div>
										11. 重新執行程式後，如果先前沒有設定過Napkin介面，程式會先要求必須下載相對應的jar檔：</div>
									<div>
										<div style="display: block; text-align: left; ">
											<a href="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_09.png?attredirects=0" imageanchor="1" style="color: rgb(0, 102, 204); outline-style: none; outline-width: initial; outline-color: initial; background-image: none; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: initial; border-bottom-style: none; border-bottom-width: initial; border-bottom-color: initial; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; "><img border="0" src="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/_/rsrc/1327210829817/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_09.png" style="border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; " /></a></div>
									</div>
									<div>
										&nbsp;</div>
									<div>
										12. 很快地下載完畢後，會發出提醒訊息，告知程式即將關閉，之後再手動重新執行：</div>
									<div>
										<div style="display: block; text-align: left; ">
											<a href="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_10.png?attredirects=0" imageanchor="1" style="color: rgb(0, 102, 204); outline-style: none; outline-width: initial; outline-color: initial; background-image: none; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: initial; border-bottom-style: none; border-bottom-width: initial; border-bottom-color: initial; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; "><img border="0" src="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/_/rsrc/1327210843602/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_10.png" style="border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; " /></a></div>
									</div>
									<div>
										&nbsp;</div>
									<div>
										13. 再次手動重新執行後，終於能看到先前所設定的背景圖片了：</div>
									<div>
										<div style="display: block; text-align: left; ">
											&nbsp;</div>
									</div>
									<div>
										<div style="display: block; text-align: left; ">
											<a href="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_00.jpg?attredirects=0" imageanchor="1" style="color: rgb(0, 102, 204); outline-style: none; outline-width: initial; outline-color: initial; background-image: none; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: initial; border-bottom-style: none; border-bottom-width: initial; border-bottom-color: initial; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial; "><img border="0" src="https://sites.google.com/site/jcomicdownloader/_/rsrc/1327211755525/step-by-step/how-to-set-the-background-of-frame/BackgroundSetting_00.jpg" style="border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; " /></a></div>
									</div>
								</div>
							</div>
							<div>
								&nbsp;</div>
						</div>
					</td>
				</tr>
			</tbody>
		</table>
	</div>
</div>
<p>
